lyrics.tlyric: 这爱火依然灼烧我心房

lyrics.lyric: When I watch you look at me
lyrics.tlyric: 当我看到你注视我的眼神

lyrics.lyric: I think I could find the will
lyrics.tlyric: 我相信我能够找到这份信念
为每个梦想坚持的信念

lyrics.lyric: And give up this fear within
Of what would happen if they ever knew
lyrics.tlyric: 就算他们知道将会发生什么

lyrics.lyric: I know you can feel it too
lyrics.tlyric: 我知道你同样能感觉到

lyrics.lyric: A thousand dreams I still believe
lyrics.tlyric: 我仍然坚信，那无数个梦想

lyrics.lyric: I'd make you give them all to me
lyrics.tlyric: 我希望你能把它们都兑现

lyrics.lyric: I'd hold you in my arms and never let go
lyrics.tlyric: 我会紧紧拥你入怀，永不分离

lyrics.lyric: I can't survive another night away from you
lyrics.tlyric: 失去你，我便见不到明天的曙光

lyrics.lyric: You're the reason I go on
And now I need to live the truth
Right now, there's no better time
lyrics.tlyric: 没有比此刻更好的时机

lyrics.lyric: From this fear, I will break free
And I'll live again with love
And know they can't take that away from me
lyrics.tlyric: 我知道没有人能夺走我的爱

lyrics.lyric: I know you can feel it too
lyrics.tlyric: 我知道你同样能感觉到

lyrics.lyric: A thousand dreams I still believe
lyrics.tlyric: 我仍然坚信，那无数个梦想

lyrics.lyric: I'll make you give them all to me
lyrics.tlyric: 我希望你能把它们都兑现

lyrics.lyric: I'll hold you in my arms and never let go
lyrics.tlyric: 我会紧紧拥你入怀，永不分离

lyrics.lyric: And this fire's getting stronger, baby
lyrics.tlyric: 心中火焰愈发旺盛，宝贝

lyrics.lyric: To feel the chance, to live again
lyrics.tlyric: 为了抓住机遇，为了浴火重生

lyrics.lyric: I know you can feel it too
lyrics.tlyric: 我知道你同样能感觉到

lyrics.lyric: A thousand dreams I still believe
lyrics.tlyric: 我仍然坚信，那无数个梦想

lyrics.lyric: I'll make you give them all to me
lyrics.tlyric: 我希望你能把它们都兑现

lyrics.lyric: I'll hold you in my arms and never let go
lyrics.tlyric: 我会紧紧拥你入怀，永不分离

lyrics.lyric: I'd give my life to live again
lyrics.tlyric: 我愿意献出生命，浴火重生
为了你，我愿意献上一切

lyrics.lyric: I'd give my life to live again
lyrics.tlyric: 我愿意献出生命，浴火重生
我将挣脱并自由，带走我吧

lyrics.lyric: Take me, take me, my everything
lyrics.tlyric: 带走我吧，将我的一切都带走

lyrics.lyric: I surrender all to you, right now
lyrics.tlyric: 为了你，此刻我愿意献上一切

lyrics.lyric: I surrender all, I surrender all to you, baby
lyrics.tlyric: 我愿意为你献上一切，宝贝

lrc.lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Louis Biancaniello/Sam Watters
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Louis Biancaniello/Sam Watters
[00:16.690]There's so much life
[00:18.850]I've left to live
[00:21.000]And this fire's burning still
[00:24.950]
[00:25.160]When I watch you look at me
[00:28.850]I think I could find the will
[00:33.710]To stand for every dream
[00:37.770]And forsake this solid ground
[00:41.680]And give up this fear within
[00:45.630]Of what would happen if they ever knew
[00:51.420]I'm in love with you
[00:54.040]
[00:55.180]'Cause I'd surrender everything
[00:59.320]To feel the chance, to live again
[01:03.620]I reach to you
[01:06.570]I know you can feel it too
[01:09.750]We'd make it through
[01:11.350]
[01:12.240]A thousand dreams I still believe
[01:16.330]I'd make you give them all to me
[01:20.450]I'd hold you in my arms and never let go
[01:28.160]I surrender
[01:33.550]
[01:36.930]I know
[01:39.010]I can't survive another night away from you
[01:45.520]You're the reason I go on
[01:49.470]And now I need to live the truth
[01:52.840]
[01:53.510]Right now, there's no better time
[01:58.070]From this fear, I will break free
[02:02.340]And I'll live again with love
[02:06.270]And know they can't take that away from me
[02:11.930]And they will see... yeah
[02:13.730]
[02:15.640]I'd surrender everything
[02:19.250]To feel the chance, to live again
[02:23.330]I reach to you
[02:27.020]I know you can feel it too
[02:30.130]We'd make it through
[02:31.310]
[02:32.250]A thousand dreams I still believe
[02:36.400]I'll make you give them all to me
[02:40.650]I'll hold you in my arms and never let go
[02:48.400]I surrender
[02:52.930]
[02:56.990]Every night's getting longer
[03:01.390]And this fire‘s getting stronger baby
[03:06.140]I'll swallow my pride
[03:09.120]And I'll be alive
[03:11.100]Can't you hear my call?
[03:15.390]I surrender all...
[03:18.630]
[03:21.300]（I'll surrender everything）
[03:24.300]（To feel the chance, to live again）
[03:28.600]I reach to you
[03:31.760]I know you can feel it too
[03:35.030]We'll make it through
[03:36.480]
[03:37.130]A thousand dreams I still believe
[03:41.030]I'll make you give them all to me
[03:45.250]I'll hold you in my arms and never let go
[03:52.920]I surrender
[03:56.630]
[04:01.970]Right here, right now
[04:05.900]I'd give my life to live again
[04:09.930]I'll break free
[04:12.160]Take me, my everything
[04:16.250]
[04:17.190]I surrender all to you
[04:20.130]（Right now）
[04:21.740]Right now
[04:22.820]（I'd give my life to live again）
[04:26.260]I'd give my life
[04:27.750]（I'll break free, Take me）
[04:30.060]Take me, take me
[04:31.700]（my everything）
[04:32.910]My everything
[04:33.790]
[04:34.700]（I surrender all to you, right now）
[04:39.130]Right now
[04:40.320]（I'd give my life to live again）

tlyric.lyric:
[by:鶯壹]
[00:16.690]依然有很长的生命之路
[00:18.850]要跋涉
[00:21.000]这爱火依然灼烧我心房
[00:25.160]当我看到你注视我的眼神
[00:28.850]我相信我能够找到
[00:33.710]为每个梦想坚持的信念
[00:37.770]我相信我能找到坚持梦想的信念，并且抛弃现有的理念
[00:41.680]也找到了勇敢的心 不再畏惧
[00:45.630]当你经受何等苦难
[00:51.420]我已坠入爱河
[00:55.180]（因为）我宁愿放弃一切
[00:59.320]为了感受如同涅槃重生的爱
[01:03.620]我奔向你
[01:06.570]我知道你同样能感觉到
[01:09.750]我们一定能克服难关
[01:12.240]那些一起许下的梦想我仍然坚信
[01:16.330]我希望你能把它们兑现
[01:20.450]我紧紧拥你入怀 永不分离
[01:28.160]我投降
[01:36.930]我知道
[01:39.010]失去你 我便见不到明天的曙光
[01:45.520]你是我生命的慰藉
[01:49.470]现在我要与这真理同存
[01:53.510]现在 这珍贵的时刻
[01:58.070]我将战胜这恐惧
[02:02.340]在爱火中涅槃
[02:06.270]没有人能征服我们的爱
[02:11.930]并且他们将见证....耶
[02:15.640]我宁愿放弃一切
[02:19.250]为了感受如同涅槃重生的爱
[02:23.330]我奔向你
[02:27.020]我知道你同样能感觉到
[02:30.130]我们一定能克服难关
[02:32.250]那些一起许下的梦想我仍然坚信
[02:36.400]我希望你能把它们兑现
[02:40.650]我紧紧拥你入怀 永不分离
[02:48.400]我投降
[02:56.990]每一夜 在思念中延长
[03:01.390]这爱火 把我心灼烫..宝贝
[03:06.140]我将忍辱负重
[03:09.120]坚强活下去
[03:11.100]你能听到我的呼唤吗？
[03:15.390]我放弃一切........
[03:21.300]（我宁愿放弃一切）
[03:24.300]（为了感受如同涅槃重生的爱）
[03:28.600]我奔向你
[03:31.760]我知道你同样能感觉到
[03:35.030]我们一定能克服难关
[03:37.130]那些一起许下的梦想我仍然坚信
[03:41.030]我希望你能把它们兑现
[03:45.250]我紧紧拥你入怀 永不分离
[03:52.920]我投降
[04:01.970]此时 此刻
[04:05.900]我要放弃一切 涅槃重生
[04:09.930]我将打破禁锢 赢得自由
[04:12.160]把我与我的所有带走吧
[04:17.190]为了你 我放弃一切
[04:20.130]（此时）
[04:21.740]此时
[04:22.820]（我要放弃一切 涅槃重生）
[04:26.260]我要放弃一切 涅槃重生
[04:27.750]（我将打破禁锢 赢得自由 带走我吧）
[04:30.060]带走我吧 带走我
[04:31.700]（我的一切）
[04:32.910]我的所有....
[04:34.700]（为了你 此刻我放弃一切）
[04:39.130]此刻
[04:40.320]（我要放弃一切 涅槃重生）
